settings.title: General Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences

profile.title: Profile Information
profile.description: Update your account information and how others see you
profile.emailNote: Email changes are managed through your account provider
profile.bioPlaceholder: Tell us a bit about yourself...

interfaceLanguage.title: Interface Language
interfaceLanguage.description: Choose your preferred language for the dashboard interface
interfaceLanguage.note: This setting affects the language of the dashboard interface. The page will reload after saving.

notifications.title: Notification Preferences
notifications.description: Choose how you want to be notified about important updates
notifications.emailNotificationsDesc: Receive email updates about your agents and usage
notifications.usageAlertsDesc: Get notified when approaching plan limits
notifications.productUpdatesDesc: Stay informed about new features and improvements

accountActions.title: Account Actions
accountActions.dangerZoneDesc: These actions cannot be undone. Please be careful.

emailTesting.title: Email Testing
emailTesting.description: Test different types of emails to ensure the email system is working correctly
emailTesting.subject: Subject
emailTesting.fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields
emailTesting.error: Failed to send test email. Check the console for details.
emailTesting.defaultSubject: Test Email from AI Agent Platform
emailTesting.defaultContent: This is a test email to verify the email system is working correctly.
emailTesting.noteText: Other email types are automatically triggered:
emailTesting.usageAlertsDesc: Sent when users approach plan limits

agents.title: My Agents
agents.description: Create and manage your AI agents. Each agent can be trained with specific knowledge and deployed anywhere.
agents.descriptionWithOrg: Create and manage AI agents for {{orgName}}. Each agent can be trained with specific knowledge and deployed anywhere.
agents.noAgentsDesc: Get started by creating your first AI agent.
agents.noAgentsInOrgDesc: Get started by creating your first AI agent for {{orgName}}.

new.title: Create New Agent
new.description: Set up your AI agent with a name and description
new.agentNamePlaceholder: e.g., Customer Support Bot, Sales Assistant
new.agentNameMinLength: Agent name must be at least 2 characters
new.agentNameMaxLength: Agent name must be less than 50 characters
new.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what this agent will help with...
new.descriptionMaxLength: Description must be less than 500 characters
new.noOrgError: No organization selected. Please select an organization first.
new.createError: Failed to create agent. Please try again.

notFound.title: Agent not found
notFound.description: The agent you're looking for doesn't exist.

knowledge.title: Sources
knowledge.description: Manage your AI agent's knowledge by adding different types of content sources.
knowledge.addSourcesDesc: Your agent needs knowledge to provide helpful responses. Start by adding content from any of these sources:

qna.name: Q&A
qna.description: Create question and answer pairs for common inquiries
qna.title: Q&A Source
qna.question: Question
qna.questionMinLength: Question must be at least 5 characters
qna.questionMaxLength: Question must be less than 500 characters
qna.answerMinLength: Answer must be at least 10 characters
qna.answerMaxLength: Answer must be less than 2000 characters
qna.noEntriesDesc: Create your first Q&A pair to help your agent answer common questions.

text.name: Text
text.title: Text Source
text.noEntriesDesc: Add your first text entry to provide knowledge to your agent.

upload.name: Files
upload.description: Upload documents (PDF, DOC, TXT) for automatic processing
upload.title: File Sources
upload.noFilesDesc: Upload your first document to add knowledge to your agent.

url.name: Website
url.description: Extract content from web pages automatically
url.title: Website Source
url.customTitlePlaceholder: Leave blank to use the page title
url.noContentDesc: Add content from a website URL to expand your agent's knowledge.

conversations.title: Conversations
conversations.description: View and manage all conversations with your agent.
conversations.noConversationsDesc: Conversations will appear here once users start chatting with your agent.
conversations.selectSessionDesc: Choose a conversation from the sidebar to view the transcript and interactive replay.

deploy.title: Deployment
deploy.description: Integrate your AI agent into any website or application in seconds.
deploy.chatWidgetDesc: Add a floating chat window to your site.
deploy.helpPageDesc: ChatGPT-style help page, deployed standalone or under a path on your site.
deploy.copyPasteNote: Copy and paste this code snippet into your application.
deploy.comingSoonNote: This integration is coming soon. Check back later for updates.
deploy.widgetCustomizationDesc: Customize how your chat widget looks and behaves on your website.
deploy.brandColorNote: This color will be used for buttons, icons, and highlights
deploy.wordpressDesc: Install as WordPress plugin or shortcode
deploy.emailDesc: Connect your agent to an email address and let it respond to messages from your customers.
deploy.zapierDesc: Connect your agent with thousands of apps using Zapier.
deploy.slackDesc: Connect your agent to Slack, mention it, and have it reply to any message.
deploy.whatsappDesc: Connect your agent to a WhatsApp number and let it respond to messages from your customers.
deploy.messengerDesc: Connect your agent to a Facebook page and let it respond to messages from your customers.
deploy.instagramDesc: Connect your agent to an Instagram page and let it respond to messages from your customers.
deploy.zendeskDesc: Create Zendesk tickets from your customers and let your agent reply to them.
deploy.salesforceDesc: Create Salesforce cases from your customers and let your agent reply to them.
deploy.apiIntegrationDesc: Integrate your agent directly with your applications using our REST API.

usage.startWithFree: Start with our free plan and upgrade when you're ready to scale
usage.getMostOut: Get the most out of your current plan
usage.maximizeFreeAgentDesc: Upload diverse knowledge sources to make your agent more capable
usage.optimizeKnowledgeBaseDesc: Keep your content focused and relevant for better responses
usage.readyToScaleDesc: Upgrade to create multiple specialized agents
usage.distributeLoadDesc: Create specialized agents for different use cases
usage.monitorPerformanceDesc: Use this dashboard to understand which agents are most effective
usage.approachingLimitsDesc: Upgrade to unlock more capacity and premium features for your growing needs.

billing.readyToScaleDesc: Upgrade to unlock more agents, higher limits, and premium features.
